subject: Re: JUnit 4.5 beta 4
msgSnippet: All, That link would be: https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278 Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
All,

That link would be:

https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278

Thanks,

David Saff

On Fri, Aug 1, 2008 at 11:53 AM, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
> All,
>
> Here's yet another beta of JUnit 4.5. Major bugs reported with
> previous betas have been fixed, and two more classes useful for
> extenders have been published and documented:
>
> - `ParentRunner` is a base class for runners that iterate over
> a list of "children", each an object representing a test or suite to run.
> `ParentRunner` provides filtering, sorting, `@BeforeClass`, `@AfterClass`,
> and method validation to subclasses.
>
> - `TestClass` wraps a class to be run, providing efficient, repeated access
> to all methods with a given annotation.
>
> If you've had problems with previous betas, please try this one out.
> If it holds up to public scrutiny, it is likely to become the
> (finally!) final release. Thanks,
>
> David Saff
>
